The albedo term is dynamic and responds smoothly to surface state transitions according to the model of ref. 68. This albedo model estimates (1) how quickly the albedo transitions from that of fresh snow to that of firn after a snowfall event and (2) how the albedo changes to that of bare ice when the snow depth becomes thin.
